title: bssndrpt expected argument "i" problem...
body:
plsss help !
i was going to buy a new pc so i copied lol on a flash drive to put it on the new pc, i didnt install it i just copied it from a flash drive and it worked fine on the old pc ..
until i bought the new pc , i copied it to the D\: drive and when i tried to open it this message popped : " bssndrpt expected argument "i" " with a lot of codes .. 
every time i try to lunch it this message pops  so , i tried re-installing the windows but it didnt work either {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} 
plss help i tried every thing but it didnt work

replies.body: Hmmmm that sounds a bit like the transfer didn't go quite as your pc expected, so it's not able to get League to launch correctly anymore. You can try grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running a repair, but it might be better to go ahead and try **reinstalling and clean uninstalling** to make sure everything is working properly.

i cant download it !!
i have a really bad network pls can u give me another solution??
ty...
If that wasn't able to help at all, hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to take a closer look at what might be going wrong.
